movies.title: His Motorbike, Her Island
movies.originalTitle: Kare no ootobai, kanojo no shima

biography.bio: Kiwako Harada was born on May 21, 1965 in Nagasaki, Japan as Kiwako Sato. She is an actress, known for His Motorbike, Her Island (1986), Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah (1991) and The Enchantment (1989).
biography.name: Kiwako Harada

biography.bio: Riki Takeuchi was born on January 4, 1964 in Oita, Japan as Chikara Takeuchi. He is an actor and producer, known for Dead or Alive (1999), Last Life in the Universe (2003) and Big Man Japan (2007).
biography.name: Riki Takeuchi

biography.bio: Noriko Watanabe was born on July 23, 1965 in Oita, Japan. She is an actress, known for Ninja Wars (1982), Totto Channel (1987) and Kekkon annai misuterî (1985). She was previously married to Hiroshi Nishioka.
biography.name: Noriko Watanabe

biography.bio: Tomokazu Miura was born on January 28, 1952 in Enzan, Yamanashi, Japan as Minoru Miura. He is an actor and writer, known for Beyond Outrage (2012), Adrift in Tokyo (2007) and M/Other (1999). He has been married to Momoe Yamaguchi since November 19, 1980. They have two children.
biography.name: Tomokazu Miura

biography.bio: Shigeru Izumiya was born on May 11, 1948 in Aomori, Japan. He is an actor and writer, known for Pom Poko (1994), Why Not? (1981) and Sanbiki no ossan (2014).
biography.name: Shigeru Izumiya

biography.bio: Ittoku Kishibe was born on January 9, 1947 in Kyoto, Japan. He is an actor and producer, known for The Blind Swordsman: Zatoichi (2003), 13 assassins (2010) and Survive Style 5+ (2004).
biography.name: Ittoku Kishibe

biography.bio: Nenji Kobayashi was born on February 7, 1943 in Katsuragi, Wakayama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Le samouraï du crépuscule (2002), Love and Honour (2006) and Fuzoroi no ringotachi (1983).
biography.name: Nenji Kobayashi

biography.bio: Tôru Minegishi was born on July 17, 1943 in Tokyo, Japan as Tomoo Minegishi. He was an actor, known for Departures (2008), Shinjuku Incident: Guerre de gangs à Tokyo (2009) and Godzilla vs. Biollante (1989). He was married to Tomoko Ai. He died on October 11, 2008 in Tokyo.
biography.name: Tôru Minegishi

biography.bio: Kôji Naka was born on June 26, 1951 in Kyoto Prefecture, Japan as Fukunaka Yasuji. He was an actor, known for Gosei Sentai Dairanger (1993), Sukeban deka (1985) and Osu!! Karate-bu (1990). He died on December 19, 2015 in Japan.
biography.name: Kôji Naka

biography.bio: Toshie Negishi, who has been in dozens of supporting roles in Japanese films since 1977, was in fact revealed by the theater when she was 21 (in 'Kohei Tsuka''s hit play "Stripper Monogatari"). Faithful to the playwright she was also in several of his other plays. Her most notable appearances in films were for Shôhei Imamura ("Vengeance is Mine", 1979; "Akai no shita no nurui mizu", 2001) and Akira Kurosawa ("Dreams", 1990; "Rhapsody in August", 1991).
biography.name: Toshie Negishi

biography.bio: Kiyohiko Ozaki was born on January 1, 1943 in Chigasaki, Kanagawa, Japan. He was an actor, known for House (1977), Hoshikuzu kyôdai no densetsu (1985) and Akuma no youna aitsu (1975). He died on May 31, 2012 in Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Kiyohiko Ozaki

biography.bio: Ryôichi Takayanagi is an actor and executive, known for The Little Girl Who Conquered Time (1983), The Aimed School (1981) and Legend of Eight Samurai (1983).
biography.name: Ryôichi Takayanagi

biography.bio: Takahiro Tamura was born on August 31, 1928 in Kyoto City, Japan. He was an actor, known for Tora! Tora! Tora! (1970), Muddy River (1981) and Empire of Passion (1978). He died on May 16, 2006 in Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Takahiro Tamura
